div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of April 9, 1892. [ELSA BREIDT, PRODIGY, GIVES PIANO RECITAL]

body.p: Little Elsa Breidt, the six year old pianist and compser, will give a recital on Monday evening at Lyon and Potter's Hall. Miss A. M. Goetz, soprano, Mr. Ludwig Marum, violinist, and Mr. Henry Schoenefeld, pianist, will assist. Little Elsa is one of Chicago's musical prodigies.
